response.original_title: Glykeia mou Koutsi, apo to Halkoutsi
response.overview: Kostas is an unemployed actor. To be able to get a job, she disguises herself as a woman and gets a job in a soap opera, in the role of a college principal. The serial and his role are very successful. Everything is going well, until he falls in love with Katia, an actress who stars in the serial...
response.title: Glykeia mou Koutsi, apo to Halkoutsi
